Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Washington/Dearborn
ShortDescription: Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State and Washington, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Washington/Dearborn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near 47th/Paulina
ShortDescription: Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Damen, 51st, Ashland and  47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Damen, 51st, Ashland and  47th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Archer.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
